text: (Cac nguoi hay nho lai) khi TA bao: “Cac nguoi hay vao thi tran nay (Palestine), cac nguoi hay tu do an uong thoa thich va cac nguoi hay vao cong trong su phu phuc va cau nguyen (TA): “Xin Ngai tha thu toi loi cho bay toi” thi TA se tha thu toi loi cho cac nguoi va TA se ban them cong đuc cho nhung nguoi lam tot (trong cac nguoi)
